Bash(ssh root@165.22.32.192 "docker exec ma_electrical-backend python3 -c ""
import psycopg2
import bcrypt
import os

password = ''password123''.encode\(''utf-8''\)
hashed = bcrypt.hashpw\(password, bcrypt.gensalt\(12\)\).decode\(\)

conn = psycopg2.connect\(
    host=os.environ[''DB_HOST''],
    dbname=os.environ[''DB_NAME''],
    user=os.environ[''DB_USER''],
    password=os.environ[''DB_PASSWORD''],
    port=os.environ[''DB_PORT'']
\)
cur = conn.cursor\(\)
# Update passwords for test users of different roles
for user in [''vdonnelly'', ''jforget'', ''cemerson'']:
    cur.execute\(''UPDATE users SET password = %s, failed_login_attempts = 0 WHERE username = %s'', \(hashed, user\)\)
conn.commit\(\)
print\(''Updated passwords for vdonnelly, jforget, cemerson''\)
conn.close\(\)
""")
